queries.variant: plant creature that is small and has strong poison abilities living in the wilderness

queries.variant: monster made of fungus that can talk with telepathy and has good wisdom

queries.variant: monster that lacks physical strength but is great at stealth and perceiving surroundings

queries.variant: mycolid creature that regains health from rotting plants and can make enemies slow down

queries.variant: being that looks like a plant, causing poison damage and resisting tiring effects
